author: arnetheduck
content:
> I am unsure why it didn't throw an error with other clients, perhaps they handle that field differently?
not sure - we have a pretty strict check on startup to prevent config/database mismatches (ie starting prater with a mainnet database) but I believe the exact semantics of non-phase0-genesis simply hasn't been written down in the spec since it doesn't happen in the wild - we could loosen the check as well, but I'd rather have more "natural-looking" genesis states - I guess one could argue this particular issue both ways though and the important thing would be to settle on one approach and write it down somewhere
